extensionDescription.message: Reverse image search using the most popular search engines, such as Google, Bing, Yandex, Baidu and TinEye.

engineName_baidu_full.description: Full name of the search engine.

contextMenuItemTitle_engine_main.description: Title of the context menu item.

contextMenuGroupTitle_searchImage_main.description: Title of the context menu group.

optionSectionDescription_engines.message: Toggle search engines and customize their order (drag and drop)
optionSectionDescription_engines.description: Description of the search engine options section.

optionValue_searchAllEnginesContextMenu_.message: Search all engines from context menu
Search all engines from submenu of context menu
Do not search all engines from context menu

optionTitle_tabInBackgound.message: Open new tabs in the background

dialogTitle_imageSelection.message: Select an image to search for

error_invalidPageUrl.message: The page URL is not valid. Try searching for the image again.

error_sessionExpired.message: The session has expired. Try searching for the image again.

error_invalidImageUrl_dataUri.message: Searching for data URI images is not supported on $ENGINE$.

error_imageNotFound.message: No image found. Try searching again by placing the cursor above the image.

error_internalError.message: Something went wrong. Reload the page before searching again.
